mapper.select: select A.*, O.name as orgName from apps A join organization O on A.orgId = O.id
select A.*, O.name as orgName from apps A join organization O on A.orgId = O.id where A.orgId = #{orgId}
select A.*, O.name as orgName from apps A join organization O on A.orgId = O.id join apps_grant G on A.id = G.appId where G.orgId = #{orgId} and A.orgId != #{orgId}
select A.*, O.name as orgName from apps A join organization O on A.orgId = O.id where A.id = #{id}
